options.name: Mirumoto's Battle Standard
options.description: Models in the bearer′s unit must re-roll natural tohit rolls of ‵1´ with Close Combat Attacks.

options.name: Dragon Claw
options.description: Attacks made with this weapon become Magical Attacks and gain +1 Strength, +2 Armour Penetration and Lightning Reflexes.

options.name: Dance of the Cherry Blossom
options.description: Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Armour Penetration. Additionally,the bearer gains Kenjutsu (2).

options.name: Black Demon Essence
options.description: Attacks made with this weapon always wound at least on a natural to-wound roll of ‵3´, ‵4´, ‵5´ and ‵6´. Additionally, the bearer gains Fear.

options.name: Symbol of Imperial Rule
options.description: The wearer gains +1 Armour. Melee Attacks against the bearer suffer a -1 to-wound modifier.

options.name: Nobunaga′s Honour
options.description: The Armour Save of the Bearer is never worse than 5+.

options.name: Curse of the Wind God
options.description: The wielder always shoots before all other models in their unit. If there is at least one successful to-hit roll of attacks with this weapon, choose one of the following Attack Attributes (Shooting), which apply to all other friendly models making Shooting Attacks with a Longbow against the same target in this phase: • Natural to-hit rolls of ‘1’ must be rerolled. • The Armour Penetration of the attack is set to 1.

options.name: Dragon Pearl
options.description: The bearer gains Weapon Master. At the beginning of each Movement Phase, choose an enemy model in base contact with the bearer′s unit carrying a Special Item other than an enchanted Suit of Armour or a Banner enchantment. The Dragon Pearl becomes a copy of the chosen Item until the end of the turn. If an enchanted Weapon or Shield is copied, the effects of the mundane equipment are also retained by the copy.

options.name: Candle of the Void
options.description: One use only. This item can be used at the beginning of any phase and lasts until the end of the Player Turn. The bearer's unit gains +4" March Rate, Swiftstride, Ghost Step and Strider. No models can join or leave the unit until the effect ends.

options.name: General's Kabuto
options.description: One use only. Must be activated when the bearer's model suffers its first wound in the game after Armour Saves. The bearer’s model gains Aegis (2+) against this wound.

options.name: Mempo of Blood
options.description: The bearer′s unit is immune to the effects of Fear and automatically passes Panic Tests caused by Terror

options.name: Mempo of Honour
options.description: Duels issued by the model must (if possible) be accepted by an enemy Character, unless a Champion accepts first. All enemy model parts suffer -1 Attack Value while fighting in a Duel with the bearer.

options.name: Prayer Beads of the Inner Fire
options.description: All models in the bearer′s unit gain Ritual Meditation.

Prayer Beads of the Inner Fire_abcd1234

options.name: Rod of the Horizons
options.description: Choose a spell that is always cast with maximised roll
